description:
Updated everything, added new features and improved the user experience. New feature included is a browser view in the app that automatically loads a web page with up to date approval ratings. 

Now hold in the palm of your hand, an attractive clock, counting down the remaining time Obama is in office. Includes a soundboard and his approval rating. 

This paid version is intended for people who wish to leave a respectful comment and give this app a higher rating than the free version. If that doesn't suit your fancy, please download the free version titled "NoBAMA".
